price: 8. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Maxaa malag loola soo diri waayey? Haddaan soo dejinno malag, arrinka mid la gooyo buu ahaan lahaa,  markaasna lama siiyeen fursad (ay ku toobad keenaan).
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞۖ وَلَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا مَلَكٗا لَّقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi malakun walaw anzalnā malakan laquḍiya al-amru thumma lā yunẓarūna
translations: respite would have been granted to them
